posts.content:
mods, if this is in the wrong place sorry...please relocate!

for sale is a retro tourer designed and built small 3 berth caravan.... it will be finished in aluminium same as the motorhomes in the pictures, fully insulated, double glazed. the interior will be finished in light blue, light wood grain and light marble funiture board . every thing is brand new, thetford cassette toilet, smev sink/cooker, waeco fridge cr65, blow air heater, therme hot water tank, ec155 elec system etc... every thing to make you camp in comfort.... it has a 1200kg single axle on an al-ko chassis with stabilizing hitch. the interior (same style as the red one pictured) will have a double bed and a single, dinning area seat upto 4, wash room and plenty of storage.... floor area 3.1m long, 1.9m wide and maximum 1.9 m tall. overall width 2m, and overall length 4.8m. we have been held up with a window delivery, so it should be completed within 2 weeks...

ideal to tow behind a classic car/hot rod/ van....







the red interior is in the motorhome and is just to show you the style, the caravan is blue.....

Â£9500

if you would like more info please call/text buzz 07880948643
still available.... will be at vanwest
